price: ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ ចូរអ្នកគោរពសក្ការៈចំពោះអល់ឡោះ។ ហើយចូរអ្នកស្ថិតក្នុងចំណោមអ្នកដែលដឹងគុណ។
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
